title: Is Gronk Done?
description:
Kimberly Martin is joined by the Patriots contingent of Field Yates, Tedy Bruschi, and Rob Ninkovich to discuss Arch Manning committing to Texas, Deandre Hopkins hoping to have his 6-game suspension reduced, 2nd year QB expectations, Schefter answers offseason questions and Rob and Tedy give their best Gronk stories. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Arch Manning commits to Texas and is Gronk really retired?
